Robin,

I believe you may be referring to Joseph Reisinger's Modular NEAT? =
 I
don't think that source code was ever released, but Joe is on this
forum=
 so he may know better.  

On the other hand, a number of version NEAT and =
HyperNEAT source code
are freely available.

ken
